msIdentifier.idno: Oxford, Sackler Library, Papyrology Rooms P. Oxy. 3380

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Lots to tidy up: Correct the word wraps at ll. 1-2, 3-4, 5-6, 7-8, 8-9, and 10-11; no handshift in l. 2 or in l. 10 (according to ed.pr., the superscripted nu in each case is added by a corrector: this can be noted in a comment rather than via markup); in l.6 the article is attested in PDUSV and omitted in ABC (the editor restores it for reasons of space); in l.6 add square brackets to Σούσοισι; simplify the l.8 comment to reflect only two possibilities; the mss. DSVU have the article τῆς, but ed.pr. doesn’t supply it (for reasons of space); add line number for lost lines at bottom of fragment; add scribal *high-punctus* in l. 12; clarify comment to l. 10 (nu written over something else—small circle or high punctus). Meta: remove volume number from Biblio 9607; update the online image link to http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-3380--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASHf9311d0b2648fdb7f68ef7; Herodotus is CWKB author 915 and work 2691; the MP3 is 474.3; note that fr. 1 has the first 6 lines, fr. 2 has the last 4 (ll. 7-8 are lost); correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchos and add Pleiades geo ref (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983)

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Lots to tidy up: Correct the word wraps at ll. 1-2, 3-4, 5-6, 7-8, 8-9, and 10-11; no handshift in l. 2 or in l. 10 (according to ed.pr., the superscripted nu in each case is added by a corrector: this can be noted in a comment rather than via markup); in l.6 the article is attested in PDUSV and omitted in ABC (the editor restores it for reasons of space); in l.6 add square brackets to Σούσοισι; simplify the l.8 comment to reflect only two possibilities; the mss. DSVU have the article τῆς, but ed.pr. doesn’t supply it (for reasons of space); add line number for lost lines at bottom of fragment; add scribal *high-punctus* in l. 12; clarify comment to l. 10 (nu written over something else—small circle or high punctus). Meta: remove volume number from Biblio 9607; update the online image link to http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=q-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about-3380--00031-001-0-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=search&d=HASHf9311d0b2648fdb7f68ef7; Herodotus is CWKB author 915 and work 2691; the MP3 is 474.3; note that fr. 1 has the first 6 lines, fr. 2 has the last 4 (ll. 7-8 are lost); correct the spelling of Oxyrhynchos and add Pleiades geo ref (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983)

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.10 by Natalie Gleason. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission and voting notes were: “Submitting for Todd Hickey's Herodotus (GRK 120) class at UC Berkeley“

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2017.12.10 by Natalie Gleason. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission and voting notes were: “Submitting for Todd Hickey's Herodotus (GRK 120) class at UC Berkeley“

div.p: Two fragments from within a column with the right margin sometimes preserved. Informal medium to small capitals.

div.ab:
κοντο ἐς Μίλητον τῆς δὲ Μι
λήτου ἐτύγχανε ν ἐπίτροπος
ἐὼν Ἀρισταγόρης ὁ Μολπα
γόρεω γαμβρός τε ἐὼν καὶ
ἀνεψιὸς Ἱστιαίου τοῦ Λυσαγό
ρεω τὸν ὁ Δαρεῖος ἐν Σούσοισι
κατεῖχε ὁ γὰρ Ἱστιαῖος τύ
ραννος ἦν Μιλήτου καὶ ἐτύγ
χανε τοῦτον τὸν χρόνον
ἐὼν ἐν Σούσοισι ν ὅτε οἱ Νάξι
οι ἦλθον ξεῖνοι πρὶν ἐόντες
τωι Ἱστιαίωι ἀπικόμενοι

item.p: According to the ed. pr., the superscripted nu could have been entered by a corrector in lines 2 and 10.
nu written over something else—either a small circle or a high punctus.

div.p: Fr. 1 has the first 6 lines, fr. 2 has the last 4 (ll. 7-8 are lost). The fragments' dimensions are as follows: upper 3.6 x 3.8 cm; lower 2.5 x 2.5 cm
